name: Sun's Out Guns Out!
description:
BSU Game Dev project 5.

Play on the game jam theme "No Weapons Allowed."

Requirements Document:

Requirements List Google Doc

Backstory:

You're one jacked-and-tan super bro, out for the usual shirtless afternoon run, but this time you decide to try a new route. While you're busy checking if you've been working your pectorals evenly, you happen to miss the giant sign warning any sun-kissed, beefy types like yourself of the onslaught of ego-crushing kryptonite that lies ahead: sleeved shirts and long pants!

Once you realize what's happening, it's too late; you're committed and can't miss the opportunity of setting a P.R. Onward you go as fast as your supa-thiccc quads can carry you, grabbing all the protein you can along the way to fight off any chances of not making gains.

Will you make it and bring sexy back, or fall like many a good youth-medium-clad men before you?

Full play-through video:

Controls:

Move Left-Right: Left Arrow / Right Arrow

Jump: Spacebar

Retry: X

Quit Game: Escape

Credits:
